title: Linux kill Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux kill command, learn how to terminate processes, and discover advanced options for managing processes effectively.

meta.title: Linux kill Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux kill command, learn how to terminate processes, and discover advanced options for managing processes effectively.
meta.keywords: Linux, kill command, process management, process termination, process control, system administration

steps.title: Understand the Purpose of the kill Command

verify.name: Verify the sleep process was terminated
verify.hint: The sleep process should have been terminated by the kill command. Please check if the process is still running.

steps.title: Terminate Processes Using the kill Command

verify.name: Verify the sleep process was terminated
verify.hint: The sleep process should have been terminated by the kill command. Please check if the process is still running.

verify.name: Verify the sleep process was terminated using SIGINT
verify.hint: The sleep process should have been terminated by the kill -SIGINT command. Please check if the process is still running.

verify.name: Verify the sleep process was terminated using SIGKILL
verify.hint: The sleep process should have been terminated by the kill -9 command. Please check if the process is still running.
